title: How to Draw a Logo in Microsoft Paint

steps.headline: Hold "Shift" Key and drag while holding down the left arrow key to draw a circle.
Select the Paint Bucket and fill the circle with a color of your choice.
Draw another circle inside the previous circle.
Select the text tool and type the name of your business, website or blog.
Save your image and you're done.

text: Open Microsoft paint.  Click on the circle tool.  Hold "Shift" Key and drag while holding down the left arrow key to draw a circle.  Select the Paint Bucket and fill the circle with a color of your choice.  Draw another circle inside the previous circle.  Select the text tool and type the name of your business, website or blog.  Save your image and you're done.
sentences: Hold "Shift" Key and drag while holding down the left arrow key to draw a circle.
Select the Paint Bucket and fill the circle with a color of your choice.
Draw another circle inside the previous circle.
Select the text tool and type the name of your business, website or blog.
Save your image and you're done.
